description:
Members:
* http://anidb.net/ch62276 [Ryuugajou Nanana] - head of Great 7, who proposed the Nanae Islands project
* Ikkaku Shunjuu - adminstrator of the islands
* Mutsumi Koma - master architect, built many buildings on Nanae Islands
* http://anidb.net/ch64817 [Maboro Shiki] - landlady of the Happy House apartment
* Futaba Saito
* http://anidb.net/ch65265 [Kurosu Sansa] - leader of the Three Skulls
* Kakyou Uzuki
name: Great 7
